question: When Government of India confers the "Highest Civilian Honor for Women" by presenting "Nari Shakti Puraskars"?
option3: 8th March, every year, International Women's Day
answer: 8th March, every year, International Women's Day
explanation: Government of India confers the "Highest Civilian Honor for Women" by presenting "Nari Shakti Puraskars" on 8th March, every year, on International Women's Day.
